pages.text: After adventuring in Everdawn I found a way to sacrifice other creatures and use their blood for my experiments. I also discovered that I can extract much more blood from other animals than I can from myself. $(br2)I attempted to sacrifice a zombie, and this produced no blood whatsoever. I guess they have been wandering for a while and all of it drained

from them a while ago. I also noticed that some animals give much more blood than others, and would be wise to experiment with the best species for sacrifice.$(br2)I am going to need a lot of this soon, I should start a farm.
